articles.title: American Airlines CEO Doug Parker to retire, President Isom to take reins March 31 - CNBC
articles.description: Parker is the second airline CEO after Southwest's to announce retirement this year.
articles.content:
American Airlines CEO Doug Parker is stepping down after eight years at the helm and will be replaced by the carrier's president, Robert Isom, on March 31, the company announced Tuesday.
